Smart Washing Machine: A washing machine that uses artificial intelligence to optimize the washing process based on the type of fabric, stains, and load size. It also has a feature to track the progress of the wash cycle and notify the user when it's finished.
Self-cleaning Washing Machine: A washing machine that uses ultraviolet light or a chemical solution to clean itself after each use, reducing the need for manual cleaning.
Washing Machine with Energy-saving Technology: A washing machine that uses energy-efficient technology to reduce water and electricity consumption during the washing process.
Washing Machine with Built-in Dryer: A washing machine that has a built-in dryer to reduce the time and effort required to dry clothes after washing.

Washing Machine with a Mobile App: A washing machine that can be controlled and monitored through a mobile app, allowing users to start and stop the wash cycle, set the temperature, and receive notifications on their phone.
